name: global-typings-generator
description: Combines .d.ts files from a set of external modules into one .d.ts file for distribution as a global browser module

scripts.all: npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/ && cp -r build/src/ dist/ && cp package.json README.md dist/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Palantir Technologies
